item.description: // Not used +++ title = “Code” +++ Below is a short list of projects I have created or worked on. You can find many more recent projects on Github or Gitlab. Sublimall - SublimeText 3 plugin to sync your configuration. ~560 stars Pyhn - Hacker News command line client. ~380 stars Requirements - Python requirements helper. ~300 stars Leselys - Web based RSS reader. ~220 stars Isit - Python environment discoverer.
